dcmuiElasticsearchURL.title: Elasticsearch URL
dcmuiElasticsearchURL.description: Access URL of Elastic Search. E.g. http://elasticsearch:9200

dcmuiElasticsearchIsDefault.title: Is Default
dcmuiElasticsearchIsDefault.description: Set this URL to the default one. (Make sure that only one of the urls - siblings child is set to default).

dcmuiElasticsearchInstalled.title: Installed
dcmuiElasticsearchInstalled.description: Use this URL in the UI
